book.synopsis: Haunted by the results of his physical, commercial artist Richard Sifkitz purchases a stationary bike that he plans to use to get back into shape, but when he paints a picturesque mural on the wall opposite his bike, he discovers that the mural is no ordinary picture and that his stationary bike is taking him on rides to places he really does not want to go.
